title: TechJobHub
description: A smart recruitment platform connecting job seekers and recruiters with AI-powered resume feedback.
longDescription: A full-stack web application that connects job seekers and recruiters through smart filtering and job management features. Integrated AI-based resume feedback using Mistral AI and LangChain to assist candidates in improving their resumes. Includes HR dashboard for job posting and candidate tracking.

title: HandyMath
description: A gesture-based arithmetic and matrix solver using real-time hand tracking.
longDescription: A computer vision-based system that solves arithmetic and matrix problems through real-time hand gesture recognition. Uses MediaPipe and OpenCV for gesture detection and provides voice feedback using text-to-speech for visually impaired users.

title: ML-LangBot
description: An AI-powered tutoring assistant for machine learning concepts.
longDescription: A modular machine learning tutoring system built using Google Gemini and LangChain. Designed with object-oriented Python architecture and interactive Streamlit interface for AI-powered learning support.

title: Intelligent Driver System
description: A real-time driver monitoring system for drowsiness detection and safety scoring.
longDescription: A machine learning-based system that monitors driver alertness using webcam input. Analyzes facial features and driving telemetry data to assess safety risks and visualize insights through an interactive Streamlit dashboard.

title: Water Potability Analysis System
description: A machine learning-based system for predicting water potability with real-time user input and interactive visualizations.
longDescription: A comprehensive machine learning application for analyzing and predicting water potability using multiple classification models including Random Forest, Logistic Regression, SVM, and Gradient Boosting. The system performs data preprocessing, statistical analysis, and generates interactive visualizations to explore water quality parameters. Built with a modular object-oriented architecture and deployed using Streamlit for real-time prediction with confidence scores and prediction history tracking.

title: Platero
description: A snack ordering web application with real-time delivery tracking and order management.
longDescription: Platero is a full-stack snack ordering web application that allows users to browse available products, place orders, and track delivery status in real time. The system includes a user-friendly interface and an efficient backend for managing snacks, customers, and live order updates. Developed using Laravel with Blade templating and Bootstrap for responsive frontend design.
